name: Rumble
title: the Mechanized Menace
i_displayname: Junkyard Titan / Junkyard Titan 2 / Junkyard Titan 3

i.name: Junkyard Titan
i.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

q.name: Flamespitter
q.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

w.name: Scrap Shield
w.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

e.name: Electro Harpoon
e.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

r.name: The Equalizer
r.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

i1.blurb: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
description: {{sbc|{{tip|Heat}}:}} '''Rumble''' gains ''{{tip|Heat}}'' each time he uses a basic [[Champion ability|ability]] (20 for {{ai|Flamespitter|Rumble}}, 20 for {{ai|Scrap Shield|Rumble}}, 10 for {{ai|Electro Harpoon|Rumble}}) and loses 10 ''{{tip|Heat}}'' per second after not using any abilities for 4 seconds.
{{sbc|Danger Zone:}} '''Rumble's''' basic abilities are enhanced when he is at/above 50 ''{{tip|Heat}}''.

{{sbc|Overheating:}} At 100 ''{{tip|Heat}}'', '''Rumble''' becomes '''Overheated''', {{tip|silence|silences}} himself for 6 seconds. While {{tip|silence|silenced}}, his [[basic attack]]s deal {{pp|25 to 110|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} each while his ''{{tip|Heat}}'' decays back to 0 over the duration.
i1.name: Junkyard Titan
notes: * The enhanced attacks apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but do not affect structures.
* ''Rumble'' can use [[summoner spell]]s and/or [[active ability items]] while {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
** Even though he can use the summoner spell, he is unable to {{si|Cleanse|cleanse}} the silence, neither can he reduce the silence's duration in any way.

riot.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

riot.name: Junkyard Titan
riot.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

riot.name: Flamespitter
riot.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
riot.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over {{ e9 }} seconds. This spell deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals {{ e5 }}% damage.

q1.blurb: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rumble''' activates his flamethrower for 3 seconds, granting 20 {{tip|Heat}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of him. Deals reduced damage to {{tip|minions}}.
{{sbc|{{ai|Junkyard Titan 2|Rumble|Danger Zone}}:}} ''Flamespitter's'' [[damage]] is increased by 50%.
leveling:
{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|{{#var:b1}} to {{#var:b5}}}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#var:r}}}}% AP)}}|Damage Per {{fd|0.25}} Seconds|{{ap|{{#var:b1}}/12 to {{#var:b5}}/12}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:r}}/12}}% AP)}}}}
{{st|Minion Damage Percentage|{{ap|{{#var:m1}} to {{#var:m5}}}}%|Total Minion Damage|{{pp|5|notooltip=true|({{#var:b1}}+({{#var:b5}}-{{#var:b1}})/4*(x-1))*({{#var:m1}}+({{#var:m5}}-{{#var:m1}})/4*(x-1))/100}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:r}}*{{#var:m1}}/100 to {{#var:r}}*{{#var:m5}}/100}}% AP)}}|Minion Damage per {{fd|0.25}} Seconds|{{pp|5|notooltip=true|({{#var:b1}}+({{#var:b5}}-{{#var:b1}})/4*(x-1))*({{#var:m1}}+({{#var:m5}}-{{#var:m1}})/4*(x-1))/100/12}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:r}}*{{#var:m1}}/100/12 to {{#var:r}}*{{#var:m5}}/100/12}}% AP)}}}}
q1.name:
<!--Edit these numbers when the ability's values change
-->{{#vardefine:b1|175}}<!--The Flamespitter's rank 1 total base damage
-->{{#vardefine:b5|315}}<!--The Flamespitter's rank 5 total base damage
-->{{#vardefine:r|110}}<!--The Flamespitter's total ratio damage
-->{{#vardefine:m1|60}}<!--The Flamespitter's rank 1 minion damage percentage
-->{{#vardefine:m5|80}}<!--The Flamespitter's rank 5 minion damage percentage
-->{{{{{1<noinclude>|Ability data</noinclude>}}}|Flamespitter|{{{2|}}}|{{{3|}}}|{{{4|}}}|{{{5|}}}
notes: * ''Flamespitter'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Rumble's''' previous orders.
* '''Rumble''' will instantly turn to face the cursor if he is not moving when ''Flamespitter'' is cast.
* ''Flamespitter'' is not canceled by self-stasis effects (e.g. {{ii|Stopwatch}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}).

riot.name: Scrap Shield
riot.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
riot.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e6 }} second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

w1.blurb: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rumble''' pulls up a {{tip|shield}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
While shielding himself '''Rumble''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} until the duration of the shield ends or the shield is broken.
{{sbc|{{ai|Junkyard Titan 2|Rumble|Danger Zone}}:}} ''Scrap Shield's'' effects are increased by 50%.
leveling:
{{st|Enhanced Shield Strength|{{ap|150|195|240|285|330}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Enhanced Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|15|22.5|30|37.5|45}}%}}
w1.name: Scrap Shield
notes: * ''Scrap Shield'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rumble's'' previous orders ([[basic attack]] animation is canceled on-cast).

riot.name: Electro Harpoon
riot.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
riot.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

e1.blurb: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rumble''' stores an ''Electro Harpoon'' charge periodically (up to 2 at once).

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rumble''' shoots a harpoon, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. Hitting the same target with another harpoon enhances the {{tip|slow}} (stacks additively).
{{sbc|{{ai|Junkyard Titan 2|Rumble|Danger Zone}}:}} ''Electro Harpoon's'' effects are increased by 50%.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 160}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 120*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Slow|{{ap|15 to 35}}%|Total Slow|{{ap|15*2 to 35*2}}%}}

{{st|Enhanced Magic Damage|{{ap|60*1.5 to 160*1.5}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Enhanced Magic Damage|{{ap|60*1.5*2 to 160*1.5*2}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Enhanced Slow|{{ap|15*1.5 to 35*1.5}}%|Total Enhanced Slow|{{ap|15*1.5*2 to 35*1.5*2}}%}}
e1.name: Electro Harpoon
notes: * Two consecutive ''Electro Harpoon'' hits on the same target cannot reduce enemy movement speed below 110, reducing non-linearly when going below 220 (gets closer to 110 the stronger the {{tip|slow}}, varying between 110 and 120 if the target didn't purchase {{ii|Boots of Swiftness}}).
* Each ''Electro Harpoon'' cast triggers {{ii|Sheen}} (and its upgrade)'s {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacks {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.

riot.name: Electro Harpoon
riot.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
riot.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

riot.name: The Equalizer
riot.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

r1.blurb: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rumble''' deploys a barrage of rockets 1000 units down the target path, landing in a line over 1 second and lasting for 5 seconds.
Enemies within the line of rockets take {{as|magic damage}} every half-second and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 35%. After leaving the area the damage will linger for 1 second.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Half-Second|{{ap|70 to 140 3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|17.5}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|70*10 to 140*10 3}} {{as|(+ 175% AP)}}}}
r1.name: The Equalizer
